48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr [may Allah be pleased with him] said:“I saw the Messenger of Allah counting At-Tasbīḥ.”

chapter.eng-name: Something Else: Regarding The Virtue Of At-Tasbih, At-Tahmud, And At-Takbir At The End Of The Prayers And When Going To Sleep
